name: MyFoodie
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my foodie
des:
Fast food joints like domino's and pizza hut are using the power of voice assistants to improve their business. You can have voice enabled Alexa who can take orders the skill enhances customer experience by leveraging the power of voice. It can be used in drive through and it help save time and resources.
You can Have the skill enabled and use the same for Placing orders. This skill is mainly a platform for the fast food joints who want to enable the power of voice in their business.
